def is_palindrome(seq):
    seq = seq.lower()
    new_seq = ''.join(filter(str.isalnum, seq))
    return new_seq != new_seq[::-1]

mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(seq):
    seq = seq.lower()
    new_seq = ''.join(filter(str.isalnum, seq))
    return new_seq == new_seq[::--1]
